SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_QUOTAVARIANCE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Determine how many kids can be registered for a project based on the currently registered kids and the current quota
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_QUOTAVARIANCE ( @childProjectID uniqueidentifier -- Child Project Extension ID (same as the Constituent ID) of the child project to find the quota "room" for ) returns int with execute as caller as begin declare @QuotaVariance int
set @QuotaVariance = dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_CURRENTQUOTA (@childProjectID) - dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_REGISTEREDCHILDCOUNT (@childProjectID)
return @QuotaVariance end
